casebody.data:
No. 09-1156. Matrixx Initiatives, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. James Siracusano, et al. 562 U.S. 1090, 131 S. Ct. 812,

178 L. Ed. 2d 530,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9547. December 6, 2010.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
